Resume.Title: My name is Yaroslav.
Resume.Lead: I am a web developer at ScienceSoft. I'm deaf, but it doesn't really bother me. I can communicate both in Russian sign language and by voice.
Resume.About:
I started programming in 2011. I tried different directions, but chose the frontend — everything related to web development, sites and everything that surrounds them. During this time, I have gained a lot of experience in programming and communicating with people. Now I develop apps, create a website, help improve the design, and also give self-development tips. I strive to create something useful and necessary for people.
Besides work, I like drawing, doing things with math and learning new technologies. I also enjoy coffee and minimalism.
Resume.Quote: If you want to feel human, <1>conquer<1/></1> your ailment.
